EmailTemplate.name: IFT Invite 2007 - Linda S.
EmailTemplate.subject: Visit Univar at IFT 2007!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Visit Univar at IFT 2007!
{!Contact.FirstName},
Although I will not be able to attend IFT this year because of my recent leg injury, I want to invite you to visit Univar's booth. Univar will be featuring several new products with a new energy drink at Booth #2658. Please stop by and try a sample!
Also, make sure to ask to get a copy of the Univar Food Formulation tool that has the latest food industry trends and supplier food ingredient technologies to solve the most difficult formulation challenges.
Fresh Ideas start at Booth #2658! Enjoy IFT 2007!
ChemCare
Univar USA
Food Ingredients
Online Ordering
This email was sent to {!Contact.Email} from Univar USA Inc.
17425 NE Union Hill Rd., Redmond, WA 98052
